quality_of_application_what_to_improve: We feel that you would benefit from undertaking greater experience in schools before being accepted onto a secondary initial teacher education programme.
quality_of_application_other_reason_deta: The course requires candidates to have a good understanding of the context in which secondary schools operate. The Secondary programme is intensive and our experience shows that candidates struggle with the training if they have little prior experience.  At present your application does not evidence your understanding securely enough to enable you to commence the course.
qualifications_other_reason_details: The Secondary programme at the OAKS offers the opportunity to develop as a subject specialist; you must demonstrate that 40% of your degree is relevant to your subject specialism and/or unfortunately your application did not show evidence of your passion for teaching your subject
